title: Provided further that for calculation of the Basic Ratio, the Land Rate (LR) and the Rate of Constru
clause_text: Provided further that for calculation of the Basic Ratio, the Land Rate (LR) and the Rate of Construction (RC) shall be taken for the year in which the Cluster Development Project is approved and LOI is issued
